node.excerpt: One who must play, cannot play - James Carse, Finite and Infinite Games  ** Light Yakuza 0 spoilers ahead, noting major ** The third chapter…

I had issue with my wrist, my livelihood was pretty much on the line, if you spend 8 hours a day writing code, you
can’t afford to hurt…

There’s this innate feeling to some people, probably most people, that they’re
not doing enough, they’re not meeting their expectations.
